attributes.action: stop david beckham from receiving a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: david beckham and wife think only of brand beckham. he stopped england progressing in the last three world cups because he is so selfish thinking about himself instead of the team. he does not deserve an honour he has done nothing to deserve this award

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
